item.description:
The next meeting of the HAC Bible Discussion Group will be 2:00PM until 5:00PM on Sunday, August 9 at USNH, 700 Hartford Turnpike in Hamden. We will see a video from 2PM until 3PM and will discuss the readings (and the video) from 3PM until 5PM. Refreshments will be served. Feel free to bring a snack to share. As always, please do the reading and feel free to bring a friend.

Reading for August 9:

A. In " How to Read the Bible: A Guide to Scripture, Then and Now" by James L. Kugel, read the following:

Chapter 28. Solomon's Wisdom, reread pages 506-514
Chapter 30. The Book of Isaiah(s), pages 538-568
Chapter 31, Jeremiah, pages 569-597

B. Look through the following:

The Wikipedia entry on "Book of Proverbs," available at http://en.wikipedia.o...

The Proverbs, available at http://www.biblestudy... (lists proverbs by topic)
and
http://www.tldm.org/b...

The Wikipedia entry on "Isaiah," available at http://en.wikipedia.o...

C. Bring in a joke (optional)

If you like, bring in a joke or short humorous writing (or a proverb) that relates to the readings for this meeting.
